sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './wishlistItem.css' const WishlistItem = props =>{ const { removeFromWishlist, item, addToBasket } = props const { title, image, price, id } = item console.log("Wishlist item:",props) return( <>
{title}
{price}
removeFromWishlist(id)} class="fa fa-close"> addToBasket(id)} class="fa fa-shopping-cart">
) } export default WishlistItem;
